layout.singingstanza: In full and glad sur -- ren -- der, I give my -- self to Thee, Thine ut -- ter -- ly and on -- ly And ev -- er -- more to be.

lyrics.stanza: In full and glad surrender, I give myself to Thee, Thine utterly and only And evermore to be.
O Son of God, who lov'st me, I will be Thine alone; And all I have and am, Lord, Shall henceforth be Thine own!
Oh, come and reign, Lord Jesus, Rule over everything! And keep me always loyal, And true to Thee, my King.
